Text: This is a crappy quality video. Suitable for a iPod or something...
Funny because I downloaded this a while back,And it was an ok quality.....Just seding very..........friggin very slow.

Hmm. Video is 224x176 at the wrong aspect ratio (4:3 instead of 16:9) and Audio is 448 !? kbps. Not the best use of bandwidth, I would say. Nevertheless, if you re-compress the audio to something reasonable (like 192 kbps mp3) with VirtualDub, and then deblock the video on playback, you get a fairly watchable result from a ~500 MB package (after Vdub remux). Thanks for the upload.

*** VIDEO INFO ***
Input Type : XVID(GVC)
Input Size : 224 x 176
FrameRate(Frame/sec) : 0.00 (25.00)


*** AUDIO INFO ***
